text: Hi Peter. I am hoping I can help you with your hair falling out. Have you looked at the HubSpot theme boilerplate. HubSpot can load in google fonts so you don't have to link to them in the head of your document. <https://app.slack.com/client/T22MX8Z8B/CSFGKSHT7/thread/CSFGKSHT7-1588466262.196300>

Here is where the font referenced in the fields.json is added to the theme. <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/blob/431851b80e69501745977049ca96426835cb1455/src/css/theme-overrides.css#L372>
